column5: Recieved this in an email today - don't know if its good in Canada or not - but if someone wants to try, feel free:        Hope it helps  Don
I got it too. Not available in Canada.
Dang!!! - didn't see anything about it - oh well - I tried!   Don

Ya, I got one too and tried to order something just to see if it would work (I wasn't going to go beyond the point of shipping, just wanted to see if it would work).  I put in the code and it said it was for Express shipping only, Canada is International ground and air only.  Sucks big time.  My heart was all aflutter there for a minute.  Our dollar at $1.10 AND free shipping, a dream come true  Joey
